quoteText:
Children Under the Age of 13

The Brainly Services and Brainly Subscriptions are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect or solicit personal information from anyone under the age of 13 or knowingly allow such persons to register. If you believe that we might have any personal information from or about a child under 13, please contact us at privacy@brainly.com
title: This service is only available to users 13 years old and over

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Use (in Part A, applicable to users unless you are in Europe) state that, "The Brainly Services and Brainly Subscriptions are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect or solicit personal information from anyone under the age of 13 or knowingly allow such persons to register." The Terms of Use (in Part B, applicable to users in Europe) state that, "You must be 13 years or older to use Brainly Services."
